mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_child_order( order_id, main_order_id, product_id, product_name, unit_price, buy_num, freight, sub_total, order_time ) VALUES ( #{orderId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mainOrderId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitPrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{buyNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{freight, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{subTotal, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{orderTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
